title: Construction Begins
description: East Germany begins building the Berlin Wall overnight, dividing East and West Berlin.

title: "Ich bin ein Berliner"
description: U.S. President John F. Kennedy delivers his famous speech in West Berlin, expressing support for the city's residents.

title: "Tear Down This Wall!"
description: Ronald Reagan calls on Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev to open the barrier.

title: The Fall of the Wall
description: Border crossings open, thousands flood across, and the Berlin Wall effectively falls.
